This method populates the end time combobox based on the start time selected
onAcCancelB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
This method takes the user to the view customers list form without saving any changes made to any data
onAcCountryIdCbox(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
This method populates the first level divisions combo box based on the Country chosen using a first level divisions query with the country ID that matches the country selected
onAcSaveB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
This method performs validation logic on all input data and saves all correct data input from the combo boxes and text fields into the database by calling the insertCustomer query

onCustomerListDeleteB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ViewCustomerListController
This method alerts the user of deleting a customer, and upon confirmation, deletes the chosen customer by ID and all of their appointments

This method collects data from the selected customer and takes the user to the update customer form
onEnterB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.ReportsScreenController
This method searches the appointments table in the database for matching appointments based on the data gathered from the combo boxes, and provides an error if incomplete information was gathered
onLoginButtonClick(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginScreenController
This method authenticates the username and password entered, writes login attempts to the login_activity.txt file, and navigates the user to the main menu screen upon a successful login
onLoginExitB(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginScreenController
This method closes the program upon clicking the exit button
